subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Stupid but True
msgSnippet: The latest version installs fine on Mac OS X 10.4.11. Thanks, Paul. Ted
messageBody:
The latest version installs fine on Mac OS X 10.4.11. Thanks, Paul.

Ted


On Nov 19, 2007 1:55 PM, Paul Tremblay <phthenry@...> wrote:
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Ted Larson Freeman wrote:
> >
> >
> > Specifically, an attempt to install Thoth on the Mac brings up the
> > Font Book application, with the messages:
> >
> > "Problems may have been found with some fonts during validation.
> > Please review the reported problems before continuing."
> >
> > "Missing OpenType Data"
> >
> > "Serious problems were found. Do not use this font."
> >
> > Does FontForge have a way to create OpenType data?
> >
>
> See my message I posted above. The bug is with Mac, as Mac has
> acknowledged. The
> font is actually not corrupt at all. But at any rate, I fixed the font
> so that this
> message should no longer appear. Download the latest version and let me
> know.
>
> Paul
>
